setting.name: FEXTOSC
setting.description: External Oscillator Selection

option.description: LP (crystal oscillator) optimized for 32.768 kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: LP

option.description: XT (crystal oscillator) above 100 kHz, below 8 MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: XT

option.description: HS (crystal oscillator) above 8 MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: HS

option.description: EC (external clock) below 100 kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: ECL

option.description: EC (external clock) for 500 kHz to 8 MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: ECM

option.description: EC (external clock) above 8 MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: ECH

setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Reset Oscillator Selection

option.description: HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 64 MHz and CDIV = 1:1
option.name: HFINTOSC_64MHZ

option.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
option.name: EXTOSC_4PLL

option.description: HFINTOSC with HFFRQ = 4 MHz and CDIV = 4:1
option.name: HFINTOSC_1MHZ

option.description: EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits (device manufacturing default)
option.name: EXTOSC

setting.name: CLKOUTEN
setting.description: Clock out Enable bit

setting.name: PR1WAY
setting.description: PRLOCKED One-Way Set Enable bit

option.description: PRLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once
option.name: ON

option.description: PRLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CSWEN
setting.description: Clock Switch Enable bit

option.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
option.name: OFF

option.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
option.name: ON

setting.name: FCMEN
setting.description: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor Enable bit

setting.name: MCLRE
setting.description: MCLR Enable bit

option.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin is MCLR; If LVP = 1, RE3 pin function is MCLR
option.name: EXTMCLR

option.description: If LVP = 0, MCLR pin function is port defined function; If LVP =1, RE3 pin fuction is MCLR
option.name: INTMCLR

setting.name: PWRTS
setting.description: Power-up timer selection bits

setting.name: MVECEN
setting.description: Multi-vector enable bit

option.description: Multi-vector enabled, Vector table used for interrupts
option.name: ON

option.description: Interrupt contoller does not use vector table to prioritze interrupts
option.name: OFF

setting.name: IVT1WAY
setting.description: IVTLOCK bit One-way set enable bit

option.description: IVTLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once
option.name: ON

option.description: IVTLOCK bit can be cleared and set repeatedly
option.name: OFF

setting.name: LPBOREN
setting.description: Low Power BOR Enable bit

setting.name: BOREN
setting.description: Brown-out Reset Enable bits

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled , SBOREN bit is ignored
option.name: SBORDIS

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: NOSLP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN
option.name: ON

setting.name: BORV
setting.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage Selection bits

setting.name: ZCD
setting.description: ZCD Disable bit

option.description: ZCD disabled. ZCD can be enabled by setting the ZCDSEN bit of ZCDCON
option.name: OFF

setting.name: PPS1WAY
setting.description: PPSLOCK bit One-Way Set Enable bit

option.description: PPSLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once; PPS registers remain locked after one clear/set cycle
option.name: ON

option.description: PPSLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly (subject to the unlock sequence)
option.name: OFF

setting.name: STVREN
setting.description: Stack Full/Underflow Reset Enable bit

option.description: Stack full/underflow will not cause Reset
option.name: OFF

setting.name: DEBUG
setting.description: Debugger Enable bit

setting.name: XINST
setting.description: Extended Instruction Set Enable bit

option.description: Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Extended Instruction Set and Indexed Addressing Mode enabled
option.name: ON

setting.name: WDTCPS
setting.description: WDT Period selection bits

option.description: Divider ratio 1:65536; software control of WDTPS
option.name: WDTCPS_31

setting.name: WDTE
setting.description: WDT operating mode

option.description: WDT enabled while sleep=0, suspended when sleep=1; SWDTEN ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

setting.name: WDTCWS
setting.description: WDT Window Select bits

option.description: window delay = 87.5; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_0

option.description: window delay = 75 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_1

option.description: window delay = 62.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_2

option.description: window delay = 50 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_3

option.description: window delay = 37.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_4

option.description: window delay = 25 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_5

option.description: window always open (100%); no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_6

option.description: window always open (100%); software control; keyed access not required
option.name: WDTCWS_7

setting.name: WDTCCS
setting.description: WDT input clock selector

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.0 kHz LFINTOSC
option.name: LFINTOSC

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 32kHz MFINTOSC output
option.name: MFINTOSC

setting.name: BBSIZE
setting.description: Boot Block Size selection bits

setting.name: BBEN
setting.description: Boot Block enable bit

setting.name: SAFEN
setting.description: Storage Area Flash enable bit

setting.name: WRTAPP
setting.description: Application Block write protection bit

setting.name: WRTB
setting.description: Boot Block Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTC
setting.description: Configuration Register Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTD
setting.description: Data EEPROM Write Protection bit

setting.name: WRTSAF
setting.description: SAF Write protection bit

setting.name: LVP
setting.description: Low Voltage Programming Enable bit

option.description: HV on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming
option.name: OFF

option.description: Low voltage programming enabled. MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR. MCLRE configuration bit is ignored
option.name: ON

setting.name: CP
setting.description: PFM and Data EEPROM Code Protection bit

option.description: PFM and Data EEPROM code protection disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: PFM and Data EEPROM code protection enabled
option.name: ON

setting.default: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
setting.name: nWDTWV

option.name: WDT window violation reset has occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has occurred

option.name: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has not occurred

setting.description: DMA2 Priority Register

setting.description: Main Routine Priority Register

setting.description: Interrupt Service Routine Priority Register

option.alias: Logical OR of all IOC flags
